net.opentsdb.core

类 HistogramCodecManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.opentsdb.core.HistogramCodecManager

  • public class HistogramCodecManager
extends Object

    Manages the histogram codecs loaded by default or as plugins. Codecs are defined in the 'tsd.core.histograms.config' property as either direct, escaped JSON or a file with the ".json" extension. Each codec config entry must include the full class name and a unique ID for the type of histogram or digest stored. WARNING: After writing data with a given ID, you cannot change the ID and read that data any more.

    This class is thread safe

    从以下版本开始:
    2.4

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      Default ctor that loads the codec map.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • HistogramCodecManager

        public HistogramCodecManager(TSDB tsdb)
        Default ctor that loads the codec map. It will parse the 'tsd.core.histograms.config' parameter. If it ends with .json then we'll try to load a file of that name, otherwise we'll just parse it as raw JSON. For each map in the JSON we search the classpath then loaded plugins.
        参数:
        tsdb - A non-null TSDB to load the config from.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the config was null or empty or if the JSON was malformed.
        RuntimeException - if the file couldn't be opened.
        IllegalStateException - if no classes/plugins of the type could be found OR if one was found but couldn't be instantiated.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCodec

        public HistogramDataPointCodec getCodec(int id)
        Return the instance of the given codec.
        参数:
        id - The numeric ID of the codec (the first byte in storage).
        返回:
        The instance of the given codec
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no codec was found for the given ID.

      • getCodec

        public int getCodec(Class<?> clazz)
        Return the ID of the given codec.
        参数:
        clazz - The non-null class to search for.
        返回:
        The ID of the codec.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class was null or no ID was assigned to the class.

      • encode

        public byte[] encode(int id,
                     Histogram data_point,
                     boolean include_id)
        Finds the proper codec and calls it's encode method to create a byte array with the given ID as the first byte.
        参数:
        id - The ID of the histogram type to search for.
        data_point - The non-null data point to encode.
        include_id - Whether or not to include the ID prefix when encoding.
        返回:
        A non-null and non-empty byte array if the codec was found.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no codec was found for the given ID or the histogram may have been of the wrong type or failed encoding.

      • decode

        public Histogram decode(int id,
                        byte[] raw_data,
                        boolean includes_id)
        Finds the proper codec and calls it's decode method to return the histogram data point for queries or validation.
        参数:
        id - The ID of the histogram type to search for.
        raw_data - The non-null and non-empty byte array to parse. Should NOT include the first byte of the ID in the data.
        includes_id - Whether or not the data includes the ID prefix.
        返回:
        A non-null data point if decoding was successful.
